function 13
function 14
func:
msg.topic = `
  SELECT 
    DATE(o.created_at) AS Ngay,
    SUM(oi.qty) AS SoLuong,
    SUM(oi.qty * oi.price) AS DoanhThu
  FROM orders o
  JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id
  GROUP BY DATE(o.created_at)
  ORDER BY Ngay ASC
`;
return msg;
